title: New: DID – Skills
body:
**DID **are a three-piece band from Turin, Italy. They describe themselves as avant-pop lovers and from the irresistibly intoxicating rhythm of new track _SKILLS_, this description seems perfectly apt. Razoring guitar stabs sit among a largely electronic backdrop as the track morphs into a playful, auto-tuned hook that has lodged itself neatly in the back of my head. Good stuff.

_SKILLS_ was released on July 1st alongside remixes from Larry Gus (DFA) and Vaghe Stelle (Astro:Dynamics).
